text_block_list.text: It had been a while since I signed a contract with Rhein Kraft.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Haa……Haa…… Phew～～!
choice_data_list: Looks like you've gotten used to the pace
Looks like you've gotten used to the pace

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, thank you very much! But, it's not enough! 
Let's keep going and going! Please!

Rhein Kraft was growing day by day and she was 
enthusiastic. Naturally, because of that, I was 
also getting more enthusiastic about teaching her.
choice_data_list: Then, next let's work on cornering
Then, next let's work on cornering

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Stay at top speed, stay at top speed…… 
Inside the target line……Uwaah!?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Auuuu～～! I crossed over the target line again……
choice_data_list: Let's focus on your form again

text_block_list.text:
Don't tilt your body while running. Face forward. 
I gave advice like that several times, but――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa……Uuu～! Why can't I do it～? 
Even though I understand it in my head～!
choice_data_list: Maybe we should call it a day

text_block_list.text:
The sun was starting to set, and it felt like we had reached 
a dead end. At times like these, it might be better to rest 
for the day. At least, that's what I thought――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……No!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I already decided to do as much as I could! 
Since I've already decided that, then for sure! I want to do it!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
One more!! As many as it takes until I can do it!! 
I'm going again!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Shoulders……up! Body, straight! 
Face forward! ――Once more!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Speed……steady! Stay……steady!! 
――Kuu～～once more!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Body, straight! Face, forward! 
Tighten my stomach……! ――Funuu～～～～!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ha～I'm glad! I was able to get the hang of it a little!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ehehee, yeah! Like this, during the day off tomorrow 
I'll be able to take a nice leisurely stroll.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……Ah, that's right! Maybe I'll take my camera 
with me! When I get back, I'll have to charge it.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah～! Ah, it's not a really professional one though, okay? While 
taking a walk, I just take a picture whenever I feel like it.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Like, let's see……something like this!

Saying that, she handed me her smartphone, and it was a picture 
of a cat with a leaf on its head……it was a really serene photo.
choice_data_list: Haha, it's quite a relaxing scene
Haha, it's quite a relaxing scene

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That's right～. 
That's what I like about it too～!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
So, things like this. While taking a walk finding 
something moving or exciting! Things like that!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I want to leave behind something like that, thinking that, 
I end up taking pictures like this! ……I don't have anything 
fancy like a single-lens reflex camera, though.

……I see. Really, it was the perfect hobby for someone who liked 
to lay in the sun. Finding photo opportunities sounded kind of fun.
choice_data_list: I kind of want to tag along now

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Walking around with a camera? 
Hmmmmm～

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
A regular walk would probably be fine but…… 
Walking around with a camera……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah～ ……sometimes, it just takes a 
long time, taking a picture that is.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
At the start, it's pretty simple I guess? 
……But, if you start nitpicking then――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
『A little more』 『I'll take another shot!』 
Just like today's training, I just couldn't……let it go!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That's why when I'm walking with a camera, I usually go alone. 
I'd feel kind of bad if I made someone wait a few hours.
choice_data_list: I see. That's the secret to a good pic
I see. That's the secret to a good pic

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Eeeeeeh! It's not something cool enough to call secret!! 
B-but……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But, honestly, it really gets me excited! 
I might work harder than normal to take a good one……ehehee.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Okay!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Waaah～! I'm getting really excited now! 
……lots of exciting things! I hope I can find them～
